result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Casey L Satter

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Casey L Satter in court with attorney Christopher Stephen Petros.  Defendant Casey L Satter in custody.  Aaron Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 16 CT 62, 16 CM 217 and 16 CM 268.  State 16 CT 62 count 1 - $1429.00 - 10 days county jail 12 mo DL revocation and 12 month IID.  16 CM 217 - 15 days county jail consecutive to 16 CT 62 and costs - all other counts dismissed and read-in
16 CM 268 - 15 days county jail consecutive to 16 CM 217 - costs and 16 CM 125 is dismissed and read-in
DE entered plea of G to 16 CT 62, 16 CM 217 count 1, 16 CM 268 count 1.    DE advised of rights and penalties; DE waives rights; parties stipulate to facts.  Court finds defendant guilty 16 CT 62 count 1 - 16 CM 217 count 1 and 16 CM 268 count 1.  Count 2 in 16 CT 62 is dismissed and other counts are dismissed and read-in.

COURT:  16 CM 125 - dismissed and read-in

16 CT 62: Fine/costs $1429.00 given 30 days to pay or set up payment plan - 10 days county jail  10 days credit time served (86 days total time served) - 12 months DL revoked plus 10 days - IID 12 months effective 45 days from today - AODA with VIP- count 1 dismissed - other counts are dismissed and read-in.

16 CM 217: 15 days county jail consecutive to 16 CT 62 credit for 15 days time served - costs $443.00  given 30 days to pay or set up payment plan
other counts are dismissed and read-in

16 CM 268:  15 days county jail consecutive to 16 CM 217 credit for 15 days time served- costs $443.00  given 30 days to pay or set up payment plan

Defendant Casey L Satter in court with attorney Christopher Stephen Petros.  Defendant Casey L Satter in custody appeared by video.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  Counsel enters NG Plea on all counts.    Bond Continues.  Scheduling conference scheduled for November 22, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Combined with 16 CT 62, 15 CM 125, 16 CM 268 and 16 CM 217.

Defendant Casey L Satter in court, in custody.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 16 CT 62, 16 CM 268 and 16 CM 217.  State calls case and recites appearances 3:13 PM.  Court addressed the defendant.   Court warrants quashed.  State requests $500.00 cash bond combined in 16 CT 62, 16 CM 125, 16 CM 268 and 16 CM 217.  Initial appearance scheduled for October 11, 2016 at 08:30 am.
